web-app.description: This is version 1.0 of an application to help students obtain information about the services that the planter offers and can make use of it, based on Servlets and JSP Pages. Written by: *** sbautista@itsoeh.edu.mx ** jgressh@itsoeh.edu.mx ** ojhernandez@itsoeh.edu.mx ** dhernandezr@itsoeh.edu.mx ** nzmorales@itsoeh.edu.mx ** edramirez@itsoeh.edu.mx Who to contact for more information.
